All.title: United States Presidential Speeches Dataset
All.description: Built a dataset containing all Presiedent speeches up to Sept. 25, 2019. This dataset is segemented into the 6 political eras of American politics. The purpose of building this dataset is to understand the platform and political atmosphere of the respective periods.
